attributes.action: Create a platform for young people to have their say
attributes.additional_details:
In the wake of the riots, I would like to see the Government try and get to the root of this problem by giving the youths a chance to speak and be heard. Perhaps an anonymous website where perpetrators could actually say why they felt the need to do what they did, and how they would like the government to improve. And what THEY feel that they need in order to be a more upstanding member of our society.

I think second guessing why youths are so unruly is dangerous, and I think they are not being listened to, creating a "them and us" division.
